SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TRN_INFO TI JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID = TI.TRN_INFO_MEMBER_ID) JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE MR ON(M.MEMBER_ID = MR.MEMBER_ID)
AND M.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_CONTACT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_GENDER , M.MEMBER_ID , M.MEMBER_CONTACT , TI.TRN_CAREER , TI.TRN_HOLD FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_TRN_INFO TI ON(M.MEMBER_ID = TI.TRN_INFO_MEMBER_ID) JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE MR ON(M.MEMBER_ID = MR.MEMBER_ID) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{ trId }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_TRN_INFO SET TRN_HOLD = '퇴사' WHERE TRN_INFO_MEMBER_ID = #{ trId } AND TRN_HOLD = '재직'
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ trId } AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT S.SAL_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_ID , SC.SAL_BASIC , SC.PT_PRICE , S.PT_COUNT , SC.COMMISSION , S.SAL_TOTAL FROM TBL_SAL_CON SC JOIN TBL_SALARY S ON(SC.SAL_CON_NO = S.SAL_CON_NO) JOIN TBL_TRN_INFO TI ON(SC.SAL_TRN_NUM = TI.TRN_NUM) JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON(TI.TRN_INFO_MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE SC.SAL_CON_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT E.RNUM , E.H_REQ_NO , E.HDATE_REQ , E.MEMBER_NAME , E.MEMBER_ID , E.H_REASON , E.HDATE , E.H_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.H_REQ_NO , D.HDATE_REQ , D.MEMBER_NAME , D.MEMBER_ID , D.H_REASON , D.HDATE , D.H_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.H_REQ_NO , A.HDATE_REQ , C.MEMBER_NAME , C.MEMBER_ID , A.H_REASON , A.HDATE , A.H_STATUS FROM TBL_HDAY_REQ A JOIN TBL_TRN_INFO B ON(A.H_TRN_NUM = B.TRN_NUM) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON(B.TRN_INFO_MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID)
(A.H_STATUS = '대기' OR A.H_STATUS = 'Y' OR A.H_STATUS = 'N')
A.H_STATUS = '대기'
A.H_STATUS = 'Y'
A.H_STATUS = 'N'
AND C.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND C.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
) D
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex } + #{ recordsPerPage }
) E
WHERE E.RNUM > #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex } ORDER BY E.RNUM

AND C.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT TR.TRN_RECORD_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_ID , TR.TRN_ATTEND_TIME , TR.TRN_LEAVE_TIME FROM TBL_TRN_RECORD TR JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON(TR.TRN_REC_MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID)
